https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rwZ6l2BLryckZUXfpbmSOtZF4oI.jpg Wisper, a successful bar owner, comes home to find his wife and children murdered. As the only black man in a white neighborhood, the police consider him a prime suspect, and Wisper is forced to try to solve the crime on his own. American Wisper
